title: Meta's AI system Llama approved for use by U.S. government agencies
description: U.S. government agencies will be able to use Meta Platforms’ artificial intelligence system Llama, a senior administration official said.
content:
U.S. government agencies will be able to use Meta Platforms' artificial intelligence system Llama, a senior administration official said, as the Trump administration pushes to integrate commercial AI tools into government operations.

title: Nvidia to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI
description: Nvidia will invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI and supply it with data centre chips, the companies said today, marking a tie-up between two of the highest-profile players in the global artificial intelligence race.
content:
Nvidia will invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI and supply it with data centre chips, the companies said today, marking a tie-up between two of the highest-profile players in the global artificial intelligence race.

title: Punjab introduces AI-powered car for driving tests
description: LAHORE: For the first time, an artificial intelligence-enabled vehicle has been developed in Punjab to conduct driving tests.
content:
LAHORE: For the first time, an artificial intelligence-enabled vehicle has been developed in Punjab to conduct driving tests.
The AI-based car, manufactured in Lahore, will be used to assess drivers’ skills. Authorities confirmed that 200 such vehicl... [412 chars]

title: World leaders, AI godfathers push UN to set global red lines for dangerous AI uses by 2026
description: A coalition of over 200 global leaders, scientists, and Nobel laureates is urging world governments to collaborate on enforceable international safeguards for artificial intelligence, citing rapidly increasing risks and advocating for action by 2026.
content: The annual High-Level Week of the United Nations General Assembly began in New York with an urgent demand for binding rules to regulate artificial intelligence (AI). A coalition of more than 200 prominent figures — among them Nobel laureates, former ... [3709 chars]

title: Greece Deploys AI to Hunt for Tax Evaders
description: Greece's Independent Authority for Public Revenue (AADE) is adopting artificial intelligence and big data analytics to more effectively identify and target high-risk cases of tax evasion, officials have announced.
content:
Greece's Independent Authority for Public Revenue (AADE) is adopting artificial intelligence and big data analytics to more effectively identify and target high-risk cases of tax evasion, officials have announced.

title: Ozak AI's Quantum Leap in Crypto with $3.3M Presale Surge
description: Ozak AI has rapidly gained attention in the crypto market, raising over $3.3 million in its latest presale stage. The project's unique blend of artificial intelligence and blockchain appeals to investors seeking high returns. With strategic tokenomics and planned exchange listings, Ozak AI is poised for significant growth.

title: Nvidia to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI, linking two artificial intelligence titans
description: The two companies signed a letter of intent to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of Nvidia systems for OpenAI and said they aim to finalize partnership details in the coming weeks.

title: Powered Hybrid Platform for Content Marketing
description: Bangalore (Karnataka) [India], September 23: Clearly Blue Digital, Bangalore's well-known content marketing and knowledge services company, has launched a groundbreaking Human-Artificial Intelligence (AI) collaboration platform designed to solve the persistent challenges facing modern marketing teams. The Clear Owl platform uniquely combines automated AI content generation with oversight from professional human content specialists, eliminating the need for complex prompting skills while ensuring quality and accuracy.

title: Indian Man, Working At IBM, Gets US O-1 Visa After 3 H-1B Rejections: "Extraordinary Ability"
description: Tanush Sharanarthi attributed his O-1 visa approval to his exceptional work and research in artificial intelligence.
content: A 26-year-old Bengaluru techie, now working at IBM in California, shared his journey of getting an O-1 visa after being rejected thrice for an H-1B visa. In a LinkedIn post, Tanush Sharanarthi attributed his O-1 visa approval to his exceptional work ... [2406 chars]
